outputs.output_descr: This is the preparatory phase for the full size proposal to the Global Environment Facility Trust aiming at reviewing the legal and institutional framework relating to charcoal, sustainable forest management and sustainable land management, demonstration of improved methods of charcoal production and establishment of performance standards for the charcoal sector regarding green house gas emissions established in Uganda.

project_descr: Addressing barriers to the adoption of improved charcoal production technologies and sustainable land management practices through an integrated approach
